fullText: This jukebox musical about the Shirelles feels more like a tribute concert than a cohesive story, though the performances of the classic songs provide genuine pleasures.
dtliExcerpt: This jukebox musical about the Shirelles feels more like a tribute concert than a cohesive story, though the performances of the classic songs provide genuine pleasures.
